column1: Great! What would you like to order?
Awesome! What can I get for you today?
Sure thing! What would you like to order?
Absolutely! What can I prepare for you?
Excellent! What’s on your mind to order?
Of course! What would you like to add?
Sounds good! What would you like?
No problem! What can I get started for you?
Great choice! What would you like to order?
